name: AnTales
description:
Play as an Ant who needs to collaborate with a Sword to make it alive!

The sword will behave as it wishes so you don't have control over it, you will need to adapt your playstyle and try to collaborate with the Sword to not die!

Controls

W A S D    - To move

Space Bar - To Roll

Other Stuff

I couldn't finish the game as I wanted to, so it doesn't have sounds and it requires more polish and game feel, despite that I uploaded the game anyway, so you can have a bit of the experience I wanted to offer :)
